name: Guide Technical Decisions
title: Guide Technical Decisions
task: Describe your approach to guiding technical decisions within the team.
goal: Ensure sound technical choices and team alignment.
context: During architecture discussions and code reviews.
details: Include decision frameworks and consensus-building techniques.

name: Mentor Developers
title: Mentor Developers
task: Explain how you mentor junior developers and foster growth.
goal: Support skill development and career progression.
details: Include mentoring strategies and feedback methods.

name: Review Code Quality
title: Review Code Quality
task: List your criteria for reviewing code quality and ensuring best practices.
goal: Maintain high standards and reduce technical debt.
context: During code reviews and pull requests.
details: Include code review checklists and tools.

name: Facilitate Technical Discussions
title: Facilitate Technical Discussions
task: Describe how you facilitate technical discussions and resolve disagreements.
goal: Reach consensus and make informed technical decisions.
context: During team meetings and design sessions.
details: Include facilitation techniques and conflict resolution strategies.

name: Plan Technical Roadmap
title: Plan Technical Roadmap
task: Outline a technical roadmap for the next release cycle.
goal: Align technical work with product goals and timelines.
context: During release planning and strategy sessions.
details: Include roadmap tools and milestone tracking.

name: Ensure Code Consistency
title: Ensure Code Consistency
task: Explain your approach to maintaining code consistency across the project.
details: Include coding standards and enforcement tools.

name: Integrate New Technologies
title: Integrate New Technologies
task: Describe your process for evaluating and integrating new technologies.
goal: Keep the project up-to-date and competitive.
details: Include evaluation criteria and integration steps.

name: Handle Technical Debt
title: Handle Technical Debt
task: List strategies for managing and reducing technical debt.
goal: Improve codebase health and reduce maintenance costs.

name: Coordinate with Stakeholders
title: Coordinate with Stakeholders
task: Explain how you coordinate technical requirements with stakeholders.
goal: Ensure technical solutions meet business needs.
context: During requirements gathering and project reviews.
details: Include communication strategies and documentation tools.

name: Lead Code Reviews
title: Lead Code Reviews
task: Describe your process for leading effective code reviews.
goal: Improve code quality and team knowledge sharing.
context: During pull requests and review meetings.
details: Include review formats and feedback techniques.

name: Support Release Planning
title: Support Release Planning
task: Explain your role in supporting release planning and deployment activities.
details: Include coordination with DevOps and deployment checklists.

name: Promote Team Collaboration
title: Promote Team Collaboration
task: List ways you promote collaboration and knowledge sharing within the team.
goal: Foster a collaborative and innovative team environment.
context: During team meetings and project work.
